DOC.brief_title: Studies Porphyria IV : Gonadotropin-Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Analogues Prevention Cyclic Attacks
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : All patient receive gonadotropin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) analogue . Treatment begin day 1 3 menstrual cycle . Low-dose estrogen begin approximately 3 month . All patient must daily calcium intake least 1 gram ; supplement allow . Patients follow least 1 year .
